objects.src: <svg width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='#1A1A1A'/><rect x='540' y='0' width='540' height='1080' fill='#2A2A2A'/><path d='M0,0 L100,0 L100,100 L0,100 Z' fill='#D4AF37' opacity='0.15'/><path d='M980,0 L1080,0 L1080,100 L980,100 Z' fill='#D4AF37' opacity='0.15'/><path d='M0,980 L100,980 L100,1080 L0,1080 Z' fill='#D4AF37' opacity='0.15'/><path d='M980,980 L1080,980 L1080,1080 L980,1080 Z' fill='#D4AF37' opacity='0.15'/><line x1='40' y1='40' x2='500' y2='40' stroke='#D4AF37' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.2'/><line x1='40' y1='1040' x2='500' y2='1040' stroke='#D4AF37' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.2'/><line x1='580' y1='40' x2='1040' y2='40' stroke='#D4AF37' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.2'/><line x1='580' y1='1040' x2='1040' y2='1040' stroke='#D4AF37' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.2'/><path d='M540,0 L540,1080' stroke='#D4AF37' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.3'/></svg>

objects.text:
• Authentic polarized lenses
• 100% UV protection
• Iconic design for all face shapes

product_details.name: Classic Ray-Ban New Wayfarer - Timeless Style Meets Premium Protection
product_details.description:
• Authentic Ray-Ban polarized sunglasses with iconic design
• Classic black frame made from high-quality acetate material
• Dark tinted lenses offering 100% UV protection
• Signature Ray-Ban logo on lens and temple
• Durable and lightweight construction for all-day comfort
• Versatile wayfarer style suitable for all face shapes
• Impact-resistant lenses for enhanced durability
• Premium hinges for long-lasting performance
• Includes original Ray-Ban case and cleaning cloth
• Unisex design perfect for any occasion

banner_details:
The banner features a modern, premium design divided into two vertical halves. The left side serves as the information area, housing textual elements such as a bold title (`heading`), a sleek, elegant subheading (`tagline`), a concise list of features (`description`), the product price (`price`), and a call-to-action button (`cta_button` and `cta`). The right side prominently displays an image of sunglasses (`product_image`) to attract attention. The visual structure is enhanced by subtle gold geometric accents and divider lines, providing an elevated, luxury feel. 

**Color Palette:**
- Background dark gray: `#1A1A1A`
- Secondary dark gray: `#2A2A2A`
- Gold accent: `#D4AF37`
- White text: `#FFFFFF`
- CTA text: `#000000`
product_color: The product image features a classic pair of Ray-Ban Wayfarer sunglasses, exuding a timeless and sleek aesthetic. The primary color is a glossy jet black (#000000) used for the frame, creating a bold and sophisticated look. The lenses are a deep charcoal gray (#2F2F2F), subtly blending with the frame while maintaining slight contrast. Silver accents (#C0C0C0) in the hinge and logo add a touch of refinement and visual interest. To create an advertising banner, a minimalistic and high-contrast palette including Black (#000000), Charcoal Gray (#2F2F2F), Silver (#C0C0C0), and White (#FFFFFF) would effectively highlight the product’s premium elegance.
